name: Port Wine Tasting in Porto
description: Experience the rich taste of authentic Port wine in its city of origin, along the scenic Douro River.

name: Exploring the Historic Center of Lisbon
description: Wander through the charming streets of Lisbon's historic center, filled with centuries-old architecture and vibrant culture.

name: Surfing in Nazaré
description: Catch some of the world's largest waves at Nazaré, a globally renowned surfing destination.

name: Visiting the Monastery of Batalha
description: Explore the majestic Monastery of Batalha, a masterpiece of Gothic and Manueline architecture.

name: Seafood Dining in the Algarve
description: Enjoy fresh, locally-sourced seafood in the beautiful coastal region of the Algarve.

name: Exploring Madeira's Laurisilva Forest
description: Hike through the ancient and UNESCO-protected Laurisilva Forest in Madeira.

name: Visiting the Belém Tower
description: Discover the iconic Belém Tower, a symbol of Portugal's Age of Discoveries.

name: Wine Tasting in the Dão Region
description: Sample exquisite wines in the Dão region, known for its exceptional wine production.

name: Exploring the Azores Archipelago
description: Embark on an adventure across the stunning and diverse Azores archipelago.

name: Strolling through the Village of Óbidos
description: Walk along the cobbled streets of the picturesque and historic village of Óbidos.
